name: distps
body: -| wceq(c0, cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c1), cop(cfv(cts, cnx), cpw(c1))))

body.origin:
|- wcel(c0, ctps)
-| wceq(c0, cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c1), cop(cfv(cts, cnx), cpw(c1))))
-| wceq(c1, cuni(cpw(c1)))
-| wcel(cpw(c1), ctop)
